    public class LicenseMetricAdmin
extends curam.util.administration.base.LicenseMetricAdmin
    License Metric Administration Interface works in tandem with the License Metric Tag Generator to log license consumption.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserCount

        public curam.util.internal.security.struct.LongWrapperStruct getUserCount()
                                                                   throws AppException,
                                                                          InformationalException
        Returns the number of authorized users in the application. The user account must be enabled to be included in the count being returned.
        Returns:
        Number of users whose account is enabled.
        Throws:
        AppException - when a problem occurs contacting the database.
        InformationalException - when a problem occurs contacting the database.
